scripts.mode:mainnet: cp subgraph-modes/mainnet.yaml subgraph.yaml && cp src/utils/consts-modes/mainnet_consts.ts src/utils/consts.ts
scripts.mode:kovan: cp subgraph-modes/kovan.yaml subgraph.yaml && cp src/utils/consts-modes/kovan_consts.ts src/utils/consts.ts
scripts.build-contract: solc contracts/Gravity.sol --abi -o abis --overwrite && solc contracts/Gravity.sol --bin -o bin --overwrite
scripts.deploy:production: yarn codegen && graph deploy josephsaw/v3 --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn codegen && graph deploy ngfam/pendle --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token d31c64a831a44bcebf0f9f2565273261
scripts.deploy:mainnet-staging: yarn codegen && graph deploy josephsaw/mainnetstaging --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token 3d75be1dce784c08949c46127a791288
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn mode:mainnet && yarn codegen && graph deploy ngfam/pendle --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token d31c64a831a44bcebf0f9f2565273261
scripts.deploy:kovan: yarn mode:kovan && yarn codegen && graph deploy ngfam/pendle-kovan --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token d31c64a831a44bcebf0f9f2565273261
scripts.deploy:test: yarn mode:mainnet && yarn codegen && graph deploy ngfam/pendle-mainnet2 --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token d31c64a831a44bcebf0f9f2565273261
